author: Nicki Cox
title: Shirtless Jeremy Allen White takes Ashley Moore to hot Pilates following steamy makeout session
description: The pair were first linked at the beginning of August after they were photographed locking lips in broad daylight while out on a coffee date.

author: Nicole Pedersen-McKinnon
title: Why we don’t cut our cosmetics (or coffees) in tighter times
description: Buying coffee and lipstick give us a hormone hit that ensures we won’t slash our spending on them when times are tight.

author: Joe Sweeney
title: Tea and coffee co-operative now in world’s top five
description: An award-winning co-operative in Wolverhampton that sources and sells Fairtrade tea and coffee nationwide has been certififed as the UK’s highest scoring B Corporation – which means it meets the foremost standards of social and environmental performance, transparency and accountability.

author: Betsy Marston
title: (Opinion) Writers on the Range: John Fielder captured Colorado’s changing landscape — let’s preserve it for him
description: If you’ve ever bought a calendar or coffee table book featuring the grandeur of Colorado’s 14’ers, the stunning color photographs were almost certainly by John Fielder.

author: Rachel Avery
title: Millie Bobby Brown larks around in micro shorts inside dream kitchen in new video
description: Stranger Things actress Millie Bobby Brown has revealed her picture-perfect kitchen in a video where she shares her morning coffee recipe.

author: The Times-Standard
title: Coffee sales help canines
description: Dutch Bros locations in Arcata and Eureka are donating $1 from every drink sold today to the Sequoia Humane Society in Eureka. Drinks available include specialty coffee, smoothies, teas, freezes, lemonade, the Dutch Bros RebelTMenergy drink and Nitro Cold Brew coffee. Participating Dutch Bros locations are located at 1108 Broadway and 430 N St., Eureka, and 5232 Mad River Parkway, Arcata. Pictured is a a dog with a "pup cup."

author: Mbalenhle Zuma
title: Be part of Black Coffee’s send-off gig ahead of New York show
description: Premium beer Castle Lite will light up Johannesburg when it hosts a massive send-off party for Grammy award winner Black Coffee. Black Coffee will be headlining the Madison Square Garden music show in New York in October. Because many people will not be able to see Black Coffee strutting out his stuff in New York, […]

author: Stephanie Gravalese, Contributor
title: Starbucks Announces Arrival Of Fall Menu Nationwide
description: The coffee chain giant inaugurates the Autumn season with new drinks and returning favorites today including the Pumpkin Spice Latte which celebrates 20 years in 2023

author: Brooke Kruger
title: Fall is on the menu as pumpkin spice coffee celebrates 20th anniversary
description: In honour of the famous flavour, Starbucks has released its fall drinks and treats menu earlier than usual. Fans can join the line up starting Thursday.

author: Michael Gallagher, Yardbarker
title: Titans mayo-in-coffee QB spotlights his 'brand' with weird habit
description: Tennessee Titans rookie quarterback Will Levis has many quirks, and one of his most infamous earned him a lifetime endorsement deal.

author: Dee-Ann Durbin
title: Starbucks’ Pumpkin Spice Latte turns 20, whether you like it or not
description: It’s the coffee giant’s most popular seasonal beverage, with hundreds of millions sold since its launch in 2003.

author: Associated Press
title: Starbucks’ Pumpkin Spice Latte turns 20, whether you like it or not
description: The seasonal drink that made pumpkin spice a star is marking two decades in the world. And unlike the autumn days it celebrates, there seems to be no chill in customer demand. Starbucks’ Pumpkin Spice Latte goes on sale Thursday in the U.S. and Canada. It’s the coffee giant’s most popular seasonal beverage, with hundreds of millions sold since its launch in 2003. And it has spawned a huge and growing industry. In the year ending July 29, Nielsen says U.S. sales of pumpkin-flavored products reached $802.5 million. That’s up 42% from the same period in 2019.

author: Chief Petty Officer Renee DeBoer
title: Navy Band Chiefs' Mess Hosts "Meet and Greet" Breakfast for 2023 CPO Selects [Image 8 of 8]
description: 230824-N-JL161-1004 WASHINGTON (Aug. 24, 2023) Chief Musician Kyle Huron mans the CPO coffee bar. The Navy Band Chiefs' Mess hosted the 2023 Chief Selects and their families in a "Meet and Greet" breakfast. (U.S. Navy Photo by Chief Musician Renee DeBoer/Released)

author: James Crowley
title: Britney Spears Seen With Mystery Man In Her On Starbucks Run One Week After Split From Sam Asgari: Photos
description: The 'Gimme More' singer was seen with an unidentified man in her passenger seat as she picked up some coffees from the drive-thru.

author: The Conversation
title: Can coffee or a nap make up for sleep deprivation?
description: FEATURE (THE CONVERSATION) — There is no denying the importance of sleep. Everyone feels better after a good night of sleep, and lack of sleep can have profoundly negative effects on both the body and the brain. So what can be done to substitute for a lack of sleep? Put another way, how can you get less […]

author: Jessica Yun
title: Price rises not over yet for Bega brands like Vegemite, Yoplait, Dare iced coffee
description: Dairy and cheese lovers be warned: some of your shopping basket staples will get more expensive, according to Bega’s executive chairman Barry Irvin.
